author: cmpilato
msg: On the '1.7.x-issue4332' branch, merge from trunk r1454217.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix issue #4332 as it applies to HTTPv1-speaking servers.
(struct repos_deletables_t): New structure for organizing stuff
being deleted from a given repository.
(delete_urls_multi_repos): Reorganize this function around the use
of a single hash of struct repos_deletables_t * objects, applying
also the following corrections/optimizations: a) use an iteration
subpool for handling deletions associated with each repository, b)
collapse redundant and overlapping delete targets to minimize the
required work, and c) anchor the commit at the lowest possible
repository directory rather than at the repository root.
